trends: There has been one other sighting in Clairton
There were no other sightings in Clairton on or around August 7th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsat home in bed. I saw it out the window.In the southwestern sky.It was stationary but it faded in out.I was curious and I told my brother about it.It disappeared.
Summary: Trapezoid shaped with white light in the middle.
